# N = int(input())
# X = list(map(int, input().split()))
N = 4
X = [2, 4, 4, 3]

for i in range(N):
    X.remove(X[i])
    X.sort()
    print(X[int(N/2)-1])
    X = [2, 4, 4, 3]

# My answer
N = int(input())
X = list(map(int,input().split()))

for i in range(N):
    B = X[:i] + X[i+1:]
    B.sort()
    print(B[N//2])

# Shortest answer
N = int(input())
X = list(map(int,input().split()))

for i in range(N):
    print(sorted(X[:i]+X[i+1:])[N//2])

import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    nums = list(map(int, input().split()))
    for i in range(n):
        nums.remove(nums[i])
        nums.sort()
        print(nums[n // 2 - 1])
        nums = nums[:n // 2] + [nums[i]] + nums[n // 2:]

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    """
    配列の要素を削除して、ソートして中央値を求める。
    """
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    for i in range(n):
        b = a[:i] + a[i+1:]
        b.sort()
        print(b[int(n/2)-1])

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
